comments: Hey, every time I try to upload a picture from my phone, the app just closes!  It's really annoying. I'm using an Android, version 2.5.1.
I can't log in! I'm sure I'm using the right password, but it won't let me in and now my account is locked. Help!
I updated the app and now all my saved data is gone! What happened? I had so much important stuff in there.
The words on my profile page are all jumbled up with the pictures. I can't read anything!
When I click 'Forgot Password' it just takes me to a weird error page. Can you fix this?
The share button on posts is broken. When I tap it, nothing happens.
Just a heads up, you spelled 'receive' wrong on the welcome screen. :)
